title: Nate Bargatze || Best of Nashville with Bert Kreischer, Shane Gillis, and more - Full Episode
description:
On this episode, we recap our week in Nashville at the Nashville Comedy Festival, highlighting some of the best moments from our interviews throughout the week. Bert Kreischer, Shane Gillis, Nate Bargatze, Brantly Gilbert, Chase Rice, Chris O'Connor, and Nate Marshall all rolled through to shoot the sh*t.
